note.p: Writer on climate, viticulture, and pomology. Resident at Pitmarston House, Worcester. Corresponding member of the Horticultural Society of London, c. 1818.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/)
Prerogative Court of Canterbury will registers (The National Archives: Public Record Office PROB 11/2176)
Transactions of the Horticultural Society of London 2 (1817): 324, 3 (1820): 249

note.term: Writer on climate, viticulture, and pomology
